title: What are my rights
if I get arrested by the police?
prompt_suggestions.content: If I get arrested by the police, what are my constitutional rights? What should I do or not do in that situation?

title: Is freedom of speech
protected for all kinds of speech?
prompt_suggestions.content: I know freedom of speech is a First Amendment right, but are there any limits to it? Is all speech protected under the Constitution?

title: What does the Second Amendment
actually say about gun rights?
prompt_suggestions.content: I hear a lot of debate about gun control and the Second Amendment. What does the text of the Second Amendment actually say and mean regarding the right to bear arms?

title: What is due process
and how does it protect me?
prompt_suggestions.content: I've heard the term 'due process' but I'm not really sure what it means. How does due process protect my rights under the Constitution?
